games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An open-world adventure game where players control Link to explore the kingdom of Hyrule.

games.name: Dark Souls III
games.description: A challenging action RPG where players explore a dark fantasy world and battle formidable enemies.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An epic Western action-adventure game set in the late 1800s, following the story of outlaw Arthur Morgan.

games.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.description: A fantasy RPG where players explore the open world of Skyrim and battle dragons.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game where players build and explore blocky worlds, mine resources, and fight monsters.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: An open-world action game set in the fictional city of Los Santos, featuring three protagonists.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: An open-world RPG set in the dystopian Night City, where players take on the role of V, a mercenary with customizable abilities.

games.name: Overwatch
games.description: A team-based first-person shooter where players choose from a roster of unique heroes with special abilities.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing.

games.name: Hades
games.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where players control Zagreus, the son of Hades, as he tries to escape the Underworld.

games.name: DOOM Eternal
games.description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where players take on the role of the Doom Slayer to fight demons.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together to complete tasks while trying to find the impostors.
